sect1.title: Kontact for GroupWise Users
sect1.para: If you are used to working in GroupWise, you should have very little trouble adjusting to Kontact. The two programs share many features and provide many of the same services. This section discusses notable terminology differences, as well as some tips to help GroupWise users make the most of Kontact.

entry.para: An event without attendees is posted. If an event has attendees, it is a Sent item.

sect2.title: Accessing GroupWise Mail Account
sect2.para: Accessing your GroupWise server is not very different from accessing an IMAP or POP3 server. Proceed as follows:

step.para: Start Kontact and select the mail component (KMail).
Choose Settings Configure KMail from the menu.
Create an new account with Add.
Choose your account type. In most cases your GroupWise account is IMAP.
Enter your login, password and hostname and proceed with OK.

sect2.title: Accessing GroupWise Calendar
sect2.para: To access your GroupWise calendar through Kontact, proceed as follows:

step.para: Start Kontact and open the calendar view (KOrganizer).
Choose Novell GroupWise Server and proceed with OK.
Enter your name, URL, user and password. The URL is your GroupWise server, for example https://groupwise.&exampledomain;:7191/soap.
Apply your settings with OK and leave the configuration dialog. The calendar view now includes your GroupWise calendar entries.

sect2.title: Tips for GroupWise Users
sect2.para: This section contains hints to help GroupWise users work with some of the differences between GroupWise and Kontact:

listitem.para: You can add your GroupWise Messenger and e-mail contacts to your Kontact contact information. Then you can create an e-mail or open an instant messaging session with that contact by right-clicking the name in the Contact view.
It is helpful to color code GroupWise items, as well as items from other sources. Color coding makes it easy to scan your e-mails, contacts, and other information for items from a particular source.
Unlike GroupWise, Kontact does not automatically enter you as an attendee for events you schedule. Make sure that you remember to invite yourself.
